Job Description: Job Description :       Develop and contribute to our successful SaaS product which is used by over 100, 000 users    Participate in code and design reviews with other developers    Handle product scalability and user experience issues. Expertise on new web technologies - HTML5,  JQuery,  Bootstrap,  Backbone or similar is a plus.     Experience in NoSql databases and cloud technologies is a plus
